name: items
description: Array of tasks within the task list.

params.name: title
params.description: Object containing the main title for the task.

params.name: text
params.description: Text to use within the title. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: HTML to use within the title. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the title wrapper.

params.name: hint
params.description: Object containing a hint for the task.

params.name: text
params.description: Text to use within the hint. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: HTML to use within the hint. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: status
params.description: Object containing the status of the task.

params.name: text
params.description: Text to use for the status, as an alternative to using a tag. If `html` or `tag` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: HTML to use for the status, as an alternative to using a tag. If `html` or `tag` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the status container.

params.name: href
params.description: The value of the linkâ€™s `href` attribute for the task list item.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the item `div`.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the `ul` container for the task list.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the `ul` container for the task list.

name: idPrefix
description: String to prefix ID for the tag and hint for each task list item. If `idPrefix` is not passed, fallback to using the `task-list` string instead.
